channel.title: Koh Lanta on Travel.Sleep.Repeat
channel.description: Recent content in Koh Lanta on Travel.Sleep.Repeat

item.title: Ko Lanta: The Perfect Island Getaway
item.description: Weâ€™ve seen our share of overhyped, touristy beach destinations in Thailand during our travels. It was time to go somewhere that retained its charm and authenticity. Welcome to Ko Lanta! It took around 90 minutes by ferry to reach Ko Lanta from Koh Phi Phi Don. It was just starting to rain as we arrived but we remained optimistic. We were picked up at the port and taken to our hotel Lanta Just Come where we stayed for a few nights.
